DocWhereRule.Name: WR1
DocWhereRule.Documentation: A Zone is grouped by the objectified relationship IfcRelAssignsToGroup. Only objects of type IfcSpace or IfcZone are allowed as RelatedObjects.
DocWhereRule.Expression: SIZEOF (QUERY (temp <* SELF\IfcGroup.IsGroupedBy.RelatedObjects | NOT(('IFCPRODUCTEXTENSION.IFCZONE' IN TYPEOF(temp)) OR ('IFCPRODUCTEXTENSION.IFCSPACE' IN TYPEOF(temp))) )) = 0
